comments.creator: mikko@redinnovation.com
comments.author: mikko@redinnovation.com
comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:6.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/6.0
Build ID: 20110811165603

Steps to reproduce:

Tried to connect Dubai Airport WLAN in Terminal 1 (hotspot called maxspot). Free access, seem to be generally availalble in the terminal.


Actual results:

The ad page redirect during the first redirect did not complete.

The connection was interrupted
        
          The connection to www.dubaiairport.com:8090 was interrupted while the page was loading.


Expected results:

You'll get redirected to the advertisement page https://dubaiairport.com/maxspot/index.html

Tested with Firefox 6 and FF mobile 10 nightly. Neither did work.

After the initial connection was made with Mobile Safari or Google Chrome Firefox could surf web pages perfectly. Only the initial redirect fails in tested FF versions.
comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:6.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/6.0
Build ID: 20110811165603

Steps to reproduce:

Tried to connect Dubai Airport WLAN in Terminal 1 (hotspot called maxspot). Free access, seem to be generally availalble in the terminal.


Actual results:

The ad page redirect during the first redirect did not complete.

The connection was interrupted
        
          The connection to www.dubaiairport.com:8090 was interrupted while the page was loading.


Expected results:

You'll get redirected to the advertisement page https://dubaiairport.com/maxspot/index.html

Tested with Firefox 6 and FF mobile 10 nightly. Neither did work.

After the initial connection was made with Mobile Safari or Google Chrome Firefox could surf web pages perfectly. Only the initial redirect fails in tested FF versions.

comments.author: mikko@redinnovation.com
comments.text:
Ooops... the browser which initiated mobile connection succesfully was stock Android browser, not Mobile Safari. 

Mobile Safari works too, though.
